g.text: Int. J. Environ. Res. Public Health
area of study that needs looking at is the interplay between climate change, occupational hazards, and
workers vulnerability. This is needed in order to help with the development of suitable climate change
To conclude, climate change policy needs to take into consideration that at each micro level
adaptive capacity may vary between groups, communities, and individuals and will rely on the
vulnerability level, resilience, and resource availability. As such, there is a need to avoid a collectivist
approach, as this approach does not acknowledge these di
H.M.M. wrote the introduction and central parts of the paper. W.L.F. coordinated the
paper and wrote the aspects related to the impacts of Urban Heat. A.M. wrote on the health impacts of Urban Heat.
This research received no external funding.
This work was performed as a part of International Climate Change Information and
The authors declare no conﬂict of interest.
